featured.text: Just like that, Deborah’s season was over.
As Deborah shuffled sideways to block the player, her knee went out and she collapsed on the court in burning pain.
What is true about Deborah Duffey? (A)
Currently a senior in college, Deborah focuses on pursuing a degree in physical therapy.
Finally, after years of training and intensive workouts, Deborah Duffey was going to compete in her first high school basketball game.

other.text: And Deborah began to see a new light in her life.
What was the new light that Deborah saw in her life? (A)
After she graduates, Deborah plans to use her knowledge to educate people how to best take care of their bodies and cope with the feelings of hopelessness that she remembers so well.
The goals of becoming an outstanding player and playing college ball were never far from Deborah’s mind.
Injuries limited Deborah’s time on the court as she hurt her knees three more times in the next five years.
With 1:42 minutes left in the game, Deborah’s team led by one point.
After suffering the bad injury, Deborah found that, for the first time in her life, she was in a situation beyond her control.
A player of Mills had possession of the ball, and Deborah ran to guard against her.
How did Deborah feel when she first hurt her knee? (A) Excited. (B) Confused. (C) Ashamed.

definition.zh_def: 德博拉，一個女性名字，源自希伯來語，意指「蜜蜂」。
definition.en_def: Deborah is a female given name of Hebrew origin, meaning 'bee'.
definition.example: Deborah is known for her wisdom and leadership.
